title: The.Evil.Within.Repack-R.G.Mechanics

Operating system : 64-bit Windows 7 SP1 / Windows 8.1
Processor : i7 or an Equivalent with four plus core processor
Memory : 4 GB RAM
Graphics card : DirectX 11, GTX 460 or equivalent 1 GB VRAM card
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectXÃ‚Â® 9.0
Free space on hard disk : 37.5 GB



Game information:  


The new project from the creator of the legendary Resident Evil series
Shinji Mikami and talented team of developers Tango Gameworks, The Evil
Within - a true embodiment of the genre Survival Horror. The world will
turn upside down, pulling you into a treacherous tangle of intrigue and
the cycle of nightmares. If you can break the vicious circle? The latest
technology of lighting and animation, available through the engine id
Tech 5, realistic creatures surround you and make you sick fantasies
to experience a truly animal fear.



RePack Features:  

The Evil Within
Do not cut / recoded
